message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount and we can negotiate from here
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share, but it's a good starting point
I'll give you a bit less than the majority, but I'm willing to compromise
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not willing to give up too much
Let's meet in the middle, 50/50 split, no more negotiations
